code: import React,{useState}from'react';import BookDetails from'./BookDetails';import'./BookStyles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookList=_ref=>{let{books}=_ref;const[selectedBook,setSelectedBook]=useState(null);const handleBookClick=book=>{setSelectedBook(book);};const closeDetails=()=>{setSelectedBook(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-list",children:[books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book",onClick:()=>handleBookClick(book),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://marketplace.canva.com/EAFaQMYuZbo/1/0/1003w/canva-brown-rusty-mystery-novel-book-cover-hG1QhA7BiBU.jpg",alt:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:book.title})]},book.id)),selectedBook&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookDetails,{book:selectedBook,closeDetails:closeDetails})]});};export default BookList;
